|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 4 |rxchains = 4 |sstreams = 4 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 2167 |nqam = 1000 |802.11n = 600/600 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = MU-MIMO, DFS (slave), |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/23/2015 |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833320313 |asin = B01H9QMOMY |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== See also [[Broadcom BCM94709R4366AC]] - [http://certifications.prod.wi-fi.org/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA64986 WFA64986] (12/05/2016) :Reference design - 802.11ac 4x4 Wireless Adapter ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bnews%5D-asus-networking-@-ces-2016-some-new-asus-2016-networking-products-5278101.html ''ASUS Networking @ CES 2016'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums] *[https://www.hispazone.com/Noticia/9911/CES-2016-ASUS-PCE-AC88-tarjeta-de-red-WiFI-PCie-con-3100-Mbps.html ''CES2016: ASUS PCE-AC88'' on '''HispaZone'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/karty/asus_pce_ac88/ ''ASUS PCE-AC88 - Adapter WiFi PCI-E AC3100'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.fedoraforum.org/showthread.php?t=310626 ''ASUS PCE-AC88'' on '''fedora forum'''] *[https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2337200 ''ASUS PCE-AC88'' on '''ubuntu forums'''] Network controller [0280]: Broadcom Device [14e4:43c3] (rev 04) Subsystem: ASUSTeK Computer Inc. Device [1043:86fb] Kernel modules: brcmfmac :As of 18 Oct 2016 there is still no Linux-compatible firmware for this device ==Pictures==
'''Retail Images''' File:PCE-AC88 01.jpg| File:PCE-AC88 02.jpg| File:PCE-AC88 03.jpg| File:PCE-AC88 04.jpg| File:PCE-AC88 05.jpg| File:PCE-AC88 06.jpg| File:PCE-AC88 07.jpg| File:PCE-AC88 08.jpg|
[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]] ==Notes== ===Wireless=== *The PCE-AC88 uses the 802.11a/b/g/n/ac standards with Broadcom's ''TurboQAM'' :(256 QAM) and ''NitroQAM'' (1024 QAM) to reach speeds up to 2167 Mbps. This device is using a [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm4366 BCM4366] (4x4 11ac) for maximum PHY rates of 2.1Gbps :on the 5GHz band (11ac) and 1Gbps on the 2.4GHz band (11n w/ 1024 QAM [''NitroQAM'']). In order to reach 1Gbps/2.4 GHz, RT-AC88U must connect to the ASUS PCE-AC88 :or RT-AC88U in media bridge mode. ====Speeds==== *'''802.11n:''' With 802.11n (both 2,4/5 GHz) the speed is 150, 200 and 250 Mbps per stream :for respectively 802.11n, w/ ''TurboQAM'' and w/ ''NitroQAM'', all with 40MHz bandwidth :(so with 4 streams 600, 800 and 1000 Mbps). *'''802.11ac:''' With 802.11ac (only 5 GHz) it is possible to reach 433 and 542 Mbps per stream :with respectively 802.11ac and 802.11ac with ''NitroQAM'' when 80MHz of bandwith is used :(so with 4 streams 1733 and 2167 Mbps). ====Antenna==== *The adapter has 4 detachable RP-SMA dual-band antenna's, connected to a magnetic base. :The base has 4 cables with RP-SMA connectors that connect to the PCIe card, one for each antenna. :The antenna's can also be mounted directly on the RP-SMA connectors of the PCIe card :instead of the magnetic base. ====Adapter==== *The adapter uses the PCIe x1 interface and fits in a single PCIe x1, x4 and x16 slot. :If the card uses the PCIe 2.0 x1 or PCIe 3.0 x1 protocol is yet unknown. :It doesn't matter anyway, because PCI-E 2.0 x1 provides 500MBps, :which the fastest 802.11ac connection can't even half-saturate. :The card is passively cooled by a fairly large heat sink for a single-slot card. Per '''ASUS''''s drivers, the PCI ID for the device is 14e4:43c3.. which seems to be the default 4366 ID. 
BCM4366_D11AC_ID	0x43c3    /* 4366 802.11ac dualband */
BCM4366_D11AC2G_ID	0x43c4    /* 4366 802.11n 2.4G device */
BCM4366_D11AC5G_ID	0x43c5    /* 4366 802.11ac 5G device */
[[Category:English Documentation]]
